articles.author: Aditya Bhattacharya
articles.title: 'Natural for Virat Kohli to be tired, unfold his final chapter': AB de Villiers - Hindustan Times
articles.description: AB de Villiers, in a chat with HT, discusses India's tour of South Africa, reflects on Proteas' World Cup 2023 run and shares thoughts on Virat Kohli's future. | Cricket
articles.content: Virat Kohli's decision to sit out the South Africa T20Is and ODIs could indicate an interesting shift in his career. At 35, Kohli is a two-time ICC trophy winner, carries the legacy of being India's … [+6435 chars]
